original_body_lines: The Election Commission of Sri Lanka has released the final results of the Anuradhapura District in the 2024 General Election with the National People’s Power (NPP) polling more than 64% of the total votes in the district.
NPP has polled 312,441 votes to win the district while the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) is second with 109,691 votes (22.75%).
Accordingly, the NPP has secured 7 seats in the district while the SJB has won two seats in the district.
